content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Farhad Abbasi from Iran. He was a potential tenant interested in renting my apartment in München.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of my apartment in München.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: Yes, we agreed on a price of 1300 Euro.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: The final agreed-upon price was 1300 Euro.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Farhad Abbasi, as a 7. He was respectful, polite, and showed a willingness to negotiate in a reasonable manner.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, at no point during the negotiation did I feel discriminated or offended. The conversation was conducted in a professional and friendly manner.
name: Evaluator
